author: ajith
msg: 1. Added a new constants class to keep the values like "any","lax" and so on
The original problem is wrongful content case (camelcase instead of lowercase)
2. Fixed a serialization issue where anyAttribute was serialized before attributes (which is invalid as per the schema spec)
3. Added two new test cases to test the new changes
